testcase.system-out: Given def temperature = { celsius: 100, fahrenheit: 212 }...................passed Then match temperature contains { fahrenheit: '#? _ == $.celsius * 1.8 + 32' }.passed Then match temperature == { celsius: '#number', fahrenheit: '#($.celsius * 1.8 + 32)' }.passed Given def json =............................................................passed Then match each json.hotels contains { totalPrice: '#? _ == $.roomInformation[0].roomPrice' }.passed Then match each json.hotels == { roomInformation: '#array', totalPrice: '#($.roomInformation[0].roomPrice)' }.passed
